attributes.action: Opposing the recent Educational Reformation in Schools and Colleges
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to scrap all plans for Educational Reform as proposed by Micheal Gove.
We want the GCSE qualification system to remain in Secondary Schools and not to be replaced by the English Baccalaureate.
We secondly, do not want the A-Level system to be changed either. We want the re-sits to remain also.
